Why Choose Peridot?

Our platform offers unique advantages for both lenders and borrowers in the DeFi ecosystem.

Get Liquidity Without Selling
Borrow cash or stablecoins while still holding your crypto.
Earn Interest on Idle Assets
Put your crypto to work and earn money on assets you're just holding.
Trustless and Transparent
No middleman; everything runs on smart contracts you can check on-chain.
Instant Access to Funds
Quickly get the cash you need without long waits or paperwork.
Market-Driven Rates
Interest rates adjust automatically based on demand, keeping things fair.
Secure Borrowing
Your loans are backed by collateral, reducing risk for both you and the system.
Open Ecosystem
Anyone can join without permission, and the platform works well with other dApps.
Community Governance
Over time, you can help decide how the platform evolves through decentralized governance.

How Peridot Works

Our platform creates efficient money markets for crypto assets with algorithmically determined interest rates.

1

Supply Assets

Deposit your crypto to start earning interest.

  • Receive tokens (cTokens) that show your deposit
  • Your balance automatically grows with interest
  • Withdraw your crypto whenever you want—no waiting period
2

Collateralize

Your deposited crypto acts as collateral, letting you borrow other assets.

  • Each asset has a limit on how much you can borrow
  • Keep a healthy balance so you don't risk liquidation
  • Supports collateral from different blockchains for extra flexibility
3

Borrow Assets

Borrow up to your allowed limit based on the value of your collateral.

  • Borrow up to your allowed limit based on collateral value
  • The interest rate you pay changes automatically with market demand
  • You can repay your loan at any time, including the accrued interest

Peridot

A decentralized cross-chain lending and borrowing platform that enables users to earn interest on their crypto assets and borrow against their collateral.
